keys.description: Returns a new Array containing all keys in self:

values.description: Returns a new Array containing all values in self:

merge(other hashes).description: Returns the new Hash formed with other hash.

merge!(other hashes).description: Returns the new Hash formed with other hash on self.

fetch(key).description: Returns the value for the given key, if found.

fetch_values(keys).description: Returns a new Array containing the values associated with the given keys *keys.

key?(key).description: Returns true if key is a key in self, otherwise false.

value?(value).description: Returns true if value is a value in self, otherwise false.

delete(object).description: Removes zero or more elements from self based on object.

invert.description: Returns a new Hash object with the each key-value pair inverted.
